Others: The Men In Blue came into the T20 World Cup looking to end their unlucky pattern of near misses in ICC events, having come painfully close to glory in recent tournaments but eventually falling short on crucial moments.
India made a positive start to the campaign with two wins in as many games so far as they sit at the top of Group A.
The USA now only need a win from their final two games to confirm Super Eight qualification.
The game takes place at Nassau International Cricket Stadium on Long Island, New York.
